text:
Champions League
PSG: the incredible statistics of Mauro Icardi!
Scorer against Brugge with PSG (1-0), Argentine striker Mauro Icardi scored 8 goals in his first 10 games in the Champions League.
07 Nov 2019, 12:40 by Charlie Creteur



Arrived in the last hours of the mercato Parisian, Mauro Icardi realizes for the moment a start of season more than honorable with the Paris Saint-Germain. In front of Edinson Cavani's injuries, the Argentinian striker on loan from Inter Milan is going for goals in Ligue 1 and the Champions League. He also scored the only goal of the game against Bruges last night (1-0).




8 goals in his first 10 games of C1




Edinson Cavani and Mauro Icardi + 11 üì∑Credit Photo - Icon Sport

As reported by OptaJean, the native of Rosario scored 8 goals in his first 10 games of the Champions League. Only Simone Inzaghi, Harry Kane and Sadio Man√© did better for their debut in the history of the competition (9). A statistic showing the player's impatience and striker instinct lent by Inter Milan.
